Rupert Arnold Hoffschmidt

Welcome to this intentionally plain site. This is my blog & library that I intend to build over my life time.

Me in 10 Seconds

  • These days I run a Kombucha brewery called ROY and I organize Europe's first conference for commercial Kombucha makers: Kombucha Summit
  • In the past, I co-founded hy! - a company that has grown into one of Germany's leading digital consultancies.
  • ENFP.
  • Berlin-based.
  • I play piano and hope to be stage ready by the time I'm 45.
